npc:
Welcome to
Nostalgia, the
dream that
never ends!

The only way
to make this
dream end, is
to die.

Which, unfor-
tunately, is
not possible
here.

They say there
is a portal
somewhere that
leads to another
dream.

A dream where
one can die...

Higher speed
will make
you jump
higher.
chest:
You obtain
a pair of
"RUNNING
BOOTS"!

Press Z to run
faster.

You obtain a
"NICE HELMET"!

Hold down arrow
while on air
and press X
to perform an
"air dive"

You can use this
skill to break
blocks or cause
quakes that
stun enemies.

You obtain the
"MASTER KEY"!

It will open
every lock.

You obtain an
"ENDLESS BAG
OF TENNIS
BALLS"!

Press S to throw
them. Use them
to hit switches
or to kill
enemies.

You obtain
a bottle of
"LUBRICANT"!

When standing on
the ground, press
down arrow and
X to slide.

You obtain an
"OLD ROCKET
PACK"!

It is no good
for flying,
but it can
reduce your
falling speed.

Press X when
in the air to
to use it.

You obtain a
"ROCKET
EXPANSION!"

It makes your
ROCKET PACK
a bit more
powerful.

Press X after the
first jump to
perform a double
jump.

You obtain an
"EXTRA GREASY
HAMBURGER"!

It will make
you sink in
water.

You obtain a
"POWER GLOVE!"

Now your spin
attack can
break blocks.

You obtain an
"EXTRA HEART!"

It increases
your maximum
life by one.

You obtain a
"POISON MUSH-
ROOM OF AWE-
SOME POWERS"!

Now you can
break blocks
from below.
With your...
head?

You obtain a
"MAGIC MAP!"

It will show
you the places
you have vis-
ited and the
treasure you
have missed.

Press Left
Shift to
open it.

You obtain a
"BRAIN!"

It will show
you ALL the
treasure (and
enemies) you
have not yet
found.
locked:
The door is
locked. You
need a key
to unlock it.
open:
You use your
MASTER KEY to
unlock the door.
respawn:
Kill yourself
and respawn
in the latest
checkpoint?
